ValidationRule.description: If status is rejected, Reason Not to Convert is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($RecordType.Name = 'STM Opportunity Record Type', ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Rejected'),ISBLANK(TEXT( Reason_Not_to_Convert__c )),NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the status is 'Rejected', Reason Not to Convert is required
